name: The King is Watching
storyline:
In this casual strategy game, you'll be able to defend your kingdom from enemy invaders and gather various resources.

The distinctive feature is that buildings only function when the king is looking at them. However, the king’s gaze isn’t very wide, so you’ll need to control the buildings you want to use
